diff_act: 6.inform them that the connection was unsuccessful

regen.absent_element: visual indication when the system is not able to connect the call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a visual indication to the driver if the system is unable to connect the call.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver.
absence: the visual indication shall be provided
